text: Fire (real name Beatriz "Bea" Bonilla da Costa), previously known as Green Fury and Green Flame, is a comic book superheroine appearing in publications by DC Comics. The character was created by Ramona Fradon and the late E. Nelson Bridwell, and first appeared in Super Friends #25 in October of 1979. == Fictional character biography == She is a Brazilian super model turned government agent turned superhero after an accident granted her the ability to generate green flames. Originally created for the Super Friends comic book, she was introduced into mainstream continuity after the Crisis on Infinite Earths. She has been a member of the Global Guardians, Justice League International, Super Buddies and Checkmate. == In other media == Michelle Hurd played Fire in the 1997 pilot movie Justice League of America. Natalie Morales went by the name "Green Fury" in an episode of the 2017 series Powerless. Category:DC Comics superheroes
